name: 'Toy Story 2' - Who's Buzz Talking To? Quiz | Movies | 10 Questions

questions.text: You're a better Buzz than I am.
questions.explanation:
Rex.

	He tells Rex this after he's lost the final battle in a Buzz Lightyear video game.

questions.text: Now just walk away... the other way...
questions.explanation:
Al.

	He says this not directly to Al, but as he's watching Al trying to buy Woody from Andy's Mom.

questions.text: Draw that man in a chicken suit!
questions.explanation:
Etch.

	Said after he decodes Al's vanity licence plate.

questions.text: Alright, but I... I don't think it'll mean the same coming from me.
questions.explanation:
Bo.

	Bo gave Buzz a kiss to give to Woody. This was Buzz's response.

questions.text: You mean the laser that's a lightbulb?
questions.explanation:
Buzz 2.

	He asks Buzz 2 this after he is threatened by its use.

questions.text: We're all toys! Do you hear me!?
questions.explanation:
Buzz 2.

	He cries this after Buzz 2 gets the better of him and straps him into an empty cardboard Buzz Lightyear box.

Buzz 2.

	This code implies that Woody is some type of royalty. Whatever, it gets Buzz 2 to work with them.

Woody.

	This parallels what Woody told Buzz in the first movie. Here though, Buzz was trying to convince Woody that his existance was better served being a toy that a museum piece.

Slink.

	This was said when they were trying to drive off in the Pizza Planet truck. They didn't move, though, until the little aliens told them to use the 'wand of power'.

questions.text: You're a bright young woman with a beautiful yarn full of hair... a hair full of yarn...
questions.explanation:
Jessie.

	He was trying to tell Jessie how he felt about her. I guess it succeeded, because she called him the sweetest space toy she'd ever met.
